name: Voicy
body:
### Welcome to [@voicybot](https://telegram.me/voicybot).
Got tired of listening to all the voice messages that people send you? Or maybe you just don't have time today to play through 10+ hours of the unread voice messages? Voicy will be your guide to convert any voice message to text. Just forward any voice message to [@voicybot](https://telegram.me/voicybot), add [@voicybot](https://telegram.me/voicybot) to your group or record a voice message yourself and [@voicybot](https://telegram.me/voicybot) will convert voice to text automatically.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Voicy? Contact the creator — [@borodutch](https://telegram.me/borodutch) — and he’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
